text: Andrew James Matfin Bell (born 14 March 1986) is an English actor and dancer. He first became known for his role in Billy Elliot (2000). He won the BAFTA Award for Best Actor in a Leading Role for this role. He is also known for his roles in the movies King Kong (2005), Jumper (2008), The Adventures of Tintin (2011), Snowpiercer (2013), Fantastic Four (2015) and Rocketman (2019). He starred as Abraham Woodhull in the TV series Turn: Washington's Spies (2014). Bell was born in Billingham, County Durham. He has one child through his marriage to actress Evan Rachel Wood from 2012 to 2014. Bell married actress Kate Mara in 2017. The couple have one child. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from County Durham Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:English child actors Category:English dancers Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors
title: Jamie Bell
